dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.left
dt-option.summary: Set the text of the SearchBuilder left button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.left` changes the text of the SearchBuilder left button.

dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the left button's text to `'<'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.left` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.
